bug.description: Want to contribute to DeepPavlov? Please read the <denchmark-link:http://docs.deeppavlov.ai/en/master/devguides/contribution_guide.html>contributing guideline</denchmark-link> first. Please enter all the information below, otherwise your issue may be closed without a warning. DeepPavlov version (you can look it up by running pip show deeppavlov): Python version: 3.7.6 Operating system (ubuntu linux, windows, ...): ubuntu linux Issue: The requirments.txt should be written for compatible with multiple versions of packages. For instance, condition numpy>=1.18.0 is preferred by software developers instead of strictly declaring numpy==1.18.0. At first, developers like me feel very inconvenient. Rgds,
